db:abstract.db:para: The QQmlFile class provides static utility methods to categorize URLs.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QQmlFile provides some static utility methods to categorize URLs and file names the way QQmlEngine does when loading content from them.

db:section.db:title: [static] bool QQmlFile::isLocalFile(const QString &url)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if url is a local file that can be opened with QFile. Otherwise returns false. Local file urls have either a qrc: or file: scheme.

db:note.db:para: On Android, urls with assets: or content: scheme are also considered local files.

db:section.db:title: [static] bool QQmlFile::isLocalFile(const QUrl &url)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if url is a local file that can be opened with QFile. Otherwise returns false. Local file urls have either a qrc: or file: scheme.

db:note.db:para: On Android, urls with assets: or content: scheme are also considered local files.

db:section.db:title: [static] QString QQmlFile::urlToLocalFileOrQrc(const QString &url)
db:section.db:para: If url is a local file returns a path suitable for passing to QFile. Otherwise returns an empty string.

db:section.db:title: [static] QString QQmlFile::urlToLocalFileOrQrc(const QUrl &url)
db:section.db:para: If url is a local file returns a path suitable for passing to QFile. Otherwise returns an empty string.
